segments.text: Do you understand any other foreign languages besides English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know a little about Japanese which is similar to Chinese not only in culture but in language itself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What band did you pass in Japanese Language Proficiency Test ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I passed the Band two in LPT , but I will try to achieve Band one which is the highest level .
segments.speaker: S2
